itunesq

Class XMLHandler

  • Object
    • XMLHandler

  • public final class XMLHandler
extends Object
    Class that reads and processes the iTunes XML file.

    This is a final class consisting entirely of static methods.

    The main public method is processXML, that uses JDOM to walk through the XML file. I'd like to note that the iTunes XML is rather ridiculous and difficult to work with. Just saying.

    Author:
    Jon

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  XMLHandler.ReadXMLTask
      Inner class that encapsulates reading the iTunes XML file in a background task.

      • getNumberOfTracks

        public static int getNumberOfTracks()
        Gets the number of tracks found in the input XML file. This is reduced by the number of remote tracks if Show Remote Tracks is not checked in the user preferences.
        Returns:
        number of tracks

      • getNumberOfPlaylists

        public static int getNumberOfPlaylists()
        Gets the number of playlists found in the input XML file, reduced by the number of ignored playlists.
        Returns:
        number of non-ignored playlists

      • getNumberOfArtists

        public static int getNumberOfArtists()
        Gets the number of artist names found in the input XML file. This is reduced by the number of artists with only remote tracks if Show Remote Tracks is not checked in the user preferences.
        Returns:
        number of artists

      • getXMLFileTimestamp

        public static String getXMLFileTimestamp()
        Gets the timestamp of the XML file.
        Returns:
        file timestamp

      • addPlaylistName

        public static void addPlaylistName(String playlistName)
        Adds a playlist name to the list of such names.
        Parameters:
        playlistName - name of the playlist

      • removePlaylistName

        public static void removePlaylistName(String playlistName)
        Removes a playlist name from the list of such names.
        Parameters:
        playlistName - name of the playlist

      • incrementPlaylistIgnoredCount

        public static void incrementPlaylistIgnoredCount(Integer increment)
        Increments the number of ignored playlists by a specified amount. This is used when a folder playlist is dynamically removed from the ignored list.
        Parameters:
        increment - number of playlists contained in the folder removed from the ignored list

      • decrementPlaylistIgnoredCount

        public static void decrementPlaylistIgnoredCount(Integer decrement)
        Decrements the number of ignored playlists by a specified amount. This is used when a folder playlist is dynamically added to the ignored list.
        Parameters:
        decrement - number of playlists contained in the folder added to the ignored list

      • processXML

        public static void processXML(String xmlFileName)
                       throws IOException
        Reads and processes the XML file.
        Parameters:
        xmlFileName - XML file name
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs trying to read the iTunes XML file.

      • transferArtistToPrimary

        public static void transferArtistToPrimary(ArtistCorrelator altArtistCorr,
                                           int primaryIdx,
                                           int altIdx)
        Transfers an artist as an alternate name to a primary artist.
        Parameters:
        altArtistCorr - artist correlator object for the alternate artist
        primaryIdx - index into the list of artist correlators for the primary artist
        altIdx - index into the list of artist correlators to be used to remove the alternate artist

      • transferArtistToPrimary

        public static void transferArtistToPrimary(ArtistCorrelator altArtistCorr,
                                           int primaryIdx,
                                           Iterator<ArtistCorrelator> artistCorrelatorsIter)
        Transfers an artist as an alternate name to a primary artist.
        Parameters:
        altArtistCorr - artist correlator object for the alternate artist
        primaryIdx - index into the list of artist correlators for the primary artist
        artistCorrelatorsIter - iterator for the list of artist correlators to be used to remove the alternate artist

      • transferArtistFromPrimary

        public static void transferArtistFromPrimary(String primaryArtist,
                                             String altArtist)
        Transfers an artist from a primary artist (as an alternate) to a standalone artist.
        Parameters:
        primaryArtist - primary artist name
        altArtist - alternate artist name

      • findArtistCorrelator

        public static ArtistCorrelator findArtistCorrelator(String artistName)
        Finds the artist correlator object for a given artist name.
        Parameters:
        artistName - artist name for which to search
        Returns:
        artist correlator object, or null if it could not be found
